member.name: T:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.AngleRangeInfo
member.summary: Describes the information about the edge and how to tessellate it.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.ShapeControlPoint
member.summary: Data that describes the important points of the shape.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeMetaData
member.summary: Additional data about the shape's control point. This is useful during tessellation of the shape.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeParameters
member.summary: Input parameters for the SpriteShape tessellator.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeUtility
member.summary: A static class that helps tessellate a SpriteShape mesh.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeParameters.adaptiveUV
member.summary: If enabled, the tessellator will adapt the size of the quads based on the height of the edge.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeParameters.angleThreshold
member.summary: The threshold of the angle that indicates whether it is a corner or not.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeParameters.bevelCutoff
member.summary: The threshold of the angle that decides if it should be tessellated as a curve or a corner.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeParameters.bevelSize
member.summary: The radius of the curve to be tessellated.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeParameters.borderPivot
member.summary: The local displacement of the Sprite when tessellated.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeParameters.carpet
member.summary: If true, the Shape will be tessellated as a closed form.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeParameters.fillScale
member.summary: The scale to be used to calculate the UVs of the fill texture.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeParameters.fillTexture
member.summary: The texture to be used for the fill of the SpriteShape.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeParameters.smartSprite
member.summary: If enabled the tessellator will consider creating corners based on the various input parameters.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeParameters.splineDetail
member.summary: The tessellation quality of the input Spline that determines the complexity of the mesh.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeParameters.spriteBorders
member.summary: The borders to be used for calculating the uv of the edges based on the border info found in Sprites.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeParameters.transform
member.summary: The world space transform of the game object used for calculating the UVs of the fill texture.
Generate a mesh based on input parameters.
member.param: Input parameters for the SpriteShape tessellator.
A list of control points that describes the shape.
Additional data about the shape's control point. This is useful during tessellation of the shape.
A paramters that determins how to tessellate each of the edge.
The list of Sprites that could be used for the edges.
The list of Sprites that could be used for the corners.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.AngleRangeInfo.end
member.summary: The maximum angle to be considered within this range.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.AngleRangeInfo.order
member.summary: The render order of the edges that belong in this range.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.AngleRangeInfo.sprites
member.summary: The list of Sprites that are associated with this range.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.AngleRangeInfo.start
member.summary: The minimum angle to be considered within this range.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.ShapeControlPoint.leftTangent
member.summary: The position of the left tangent in local space.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.ShapeControlPoint.mode
member.summary: The various modes of the tangent handles. They could be continuous or broken.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.ShapeControlPoint.position
member.summary: The position of this point in the object's local space.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.ShapeControlPoint.rightTangent
member.summary: The position of the right tangent point in the local space.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeMetaData.bevelCutoff
member.summary: The threshold of the angle that decides if it should be tessellated as a curve or a corner.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeMetaData.bevelSize
member.summary: The radius of the curve to be tessellated.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeMetaData.corner
member.summary: True will indicate that this point should be tessellated as a corner or a continuous line otherwise.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeMetaData.height
member.summary: The height of the tessellated edge.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.Experimental.U2D.SpriteShapeMetaData.spriteIndex
member.summary: The Sprite to be used for a particular edge.
